definition: to turn/to twist/to wring/to sprain/to swing one's hips

sentences.english: The rotary bable can't rotate . There is too much torque.
sentences.chinese: 轉盤不能轉了，扭矩太大了。

sentences.english: Smooth downshifts are enhanced by a standard, back-torque limiting clutch.
sentences.chinese: 光滑平順而得到加強，一個標準，回扭矩限制離合器。

sentences.english: The dynamometer is normally used to check engine torque.
sentences.chinese: 測功器通常用於檢測發動機的輸出扭矩。

sentences.english: Canted yoke design provides high start torque.
sentences.chinese: 傾斜枷鎖開始設計提供高扭矩。

sentences.english: The most common torque need for the upper incisors during orthodontic treatment is increased palatal root torque.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的扭矩需要切牙正畸治療中增加齶根扭矩。

sentences.english: The most common torque need for the upper incisors during orthodontic treatment is increased palatal root torque.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的扭矩需要切牙正畸治療中增加齶根扭矩。

sentences.english: The R Series includes a high torque-to-size ratio as well as accurate positioning.
sentences.chinese: R系列包括一個高扭矩的大小比例，以及精確的定位。

sentences.english: Mainly discussed the technical development of the driving system with high torque twin screw extruder.
sentences.chinese: 着重論述了高扭矩雙螺桿擠出機傳動系統的技術發展。

sentences.english: Then a nut is screwed onto the molded-in stud and tightened with a torque of 6 Nm.
sentences.chinese: 然後堅果被擰緊鑄造在螺柱並且拉緊以扭矩6毫微米。

sentences.english: The research then focuses on the mechanism which a pivot can resist external torques at arbitrary position.
sentences.chinese: 其次探討當此轉軸靜止時抵抗外加扭矩之機制。

sentences.english: ESP intervenes and brakes the right rear wheel while at the same time reducing engine torque.
sentences.chinese: ESP干預制動右後輪同時減小發動機扭矩。

sentences.english: The hydraulic damper can close the door automatically by means of torque energy stored when the door is opened.
sentences.chinese: 它可以利用開門時蓄存的扭矩能量，自動將門關閉。

sentences.english: A method of infrared short range telemetry for torque measurement of rotating shaft is stated.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種對旋轉軸扭矩測試的紅外近程遙測法。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the design and components of the measuring system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了槍械扭簧扭矩測量系統的設計及組成。

sentences.english: The torque sensor, which is capable of detecting the cutting torque without contact, is developed.
sentences.chinese: 開發了不用接觸就能測得銑削扭矩的轉矩傳感器。

sentences.english: The circulation control tail boom is a new technology used as an anti-torque system for the no tail rotor helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 環量控制尾梁是無尾槳直升機反扭矩新技術。

definition: angular velocity/number of revolutions per minute
power output (of an electrical device etc)
